scripts.test: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('bun --version', {stdio: 'ignore'}); } catch { console.log('Bun not available, skipping bun tests'); process.exit(0); }" && bun test
scripts.test:coverage: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('bun --version', {stdio: 'ignore'}); } catch { console.log('Bun not available, skipping bun coverage'); process.exit(0); }" && bun test --coverage
